title: Update footer website link to open www.vinodelectricals.com

requirements.text: Add or update the website link shown in the site footer so that its link destination (href) opens exactly https://www.vinodelectricals.com, and the displayed link text is exactly "www.vinodelectricals.com" (no protocol).

quotes: the link through which website will open that should only be www.vinodelectricals.com

acceptanceCriteria: The footer contains a visible website link whose displayed text is exactly "www.vinodelectricals.com".
Clicking the footer website link navigates to (or opens) exactly https://www.vinodelectricals.com.
No other footer links (e.g., the Admin link) are changed or broken.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not change any backend canister logic.
Do not redesign unrelated footer content or change contact details.
